meanings.definition: In a wealthy or luxurious manner.
meanings.sent1: The princess lived opulently in her grand castle.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy businessman traveled opulently in his private jet.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched out opulently on the soft velvet couch.
meanings.sent4: The sun set opulently over the horizon, painting the sky in rich colors.
meanings.sent5: The garden bloomed opulently with vibrant flowers and lush greenery.

meanings.sent1: The opulent mansion was filled with luxurious furnishings.
meanings.sent2: She wore an opulent gown to the extravagant ball.
meanings.sent3: The opulent feast left everyone feeling satisfied and content.
meanings.sent4: The opulent palace gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of power and wealth.
meanings.sent5: The opulent lifestyle of the rich and famous was on full display at the exclusive event.
